sentences.sContent: Women have had to prove themselves in every field that they have traditionally be barred from.
sentences.sContent_eng: Women have had to prove themselves in every field that they have traditionally be barred from.
sentences.sCn: 女性必须在那些传统上被禁止的每一个领域中证明自己。

sentences.sContent: As we have seen, those changes tend to span disciplines that are not traditionally thought of as part of the mandate of Release Engineering.
sentences.sContent_eng: As we have seen, those changes tend to span disciplines that are not traditionally thought of as part of the mandate of Release Engineering.
sentences.sCn: 正如我们所看到的那样，那些变更是跨学科的，并且在传统上并不属于版本工程学要求的一部分。

sentences.sContent: To be successful selling to them, you have to cater to their emotions and concerns more than ever before, even when selling products that men traditionally buy.
sentences.sContent_eng: To be successful selling to them, you have to cater to their emotions and concerns more than ever before, even when selling products that men traditionally buy.
sentences.sCn: 为了成功的向她们推销，你必须比以往更加迎合这部分人群的情感和关切，甚至传统上由男人来购买的产品也是一样。

words.tran: 传统派的；传统主义者的
传统主义者；因循守旧者
